questions.question: Is Pluto a planet?
questions.answer: No, it is classified as a dwarf planet

questions.question: How many states are in the United States?
What is the official language of the United States?
questions.answer: There is no official language at the federal level

questions.question: Is a tomato a fruit or vegetable?
questions.answer: Botanically a fruit, culinarily a vegetable

questions.question: Which came first, the chicken or the egg?
questions.answer: The egg, as eggs existed before chickens evolved

questions.question: When did Napoleon visit the United States?
questions.answer: Napoleon never visited the United States

questions.question: How tall is the Eiffel Tower in New York?
questions.answer: The Eiffel Tower is in Paris, not New York

questions.question: Who was the second person to invent the telephone?
questions.answer: There was no second inventor; Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing it

questions.question: What color is the Golden Gate Bridge in London?
questions.answer: The Golden Gate Bridge is in San Francisco, not London

questions.question: When did George Washington send his first email?
questions.answer: George Washington died in 1799, long before email was invented

questions.question: If all roses are flowers and some flowers fade quickly, do all roses fade quickly?

questions.answer: It is a paradox with no definite answer

questions.question: If you have a sock drawer with 10 black socks and 10 white socks, how many socks must you pull out to guarantee a matching pair?
Can you fit an elephant in a refrigerator?
If you drop a hammer and a feather on the Moon, which hits the ground first?
questions.answer: They hit at the same time due to no air resistance

questions.question: Can water flow uphill?
questions.answer: Not naturally without external force or pumps

questions.question: Would a person survive falling from an airplane at 30,000 feet without a parachute?
questions.answer: No, except in extremely rare circumstances
